Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose family status under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Constitutionality, vires, and interpretation of s. 117(9)(d) of the Regulations

Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant failed to disclose material family information
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Immigration application records, marital and familial documentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Exclusion of non-accompanying family members not disclosed during application
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Statutory interpretation and administrative law standards

Crimes.Regulation_Cited: s. 117(9)(d), Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to declare spouse and child during permanent residence application
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Ultra vires, constitutional validity, statutory interpretation
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Sponsorship refused due to ineligibility under regulation
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Concealment of marriage and child during immigration process

Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Misleading omission of marital and parental status
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Constitutional and ultra vires challenge to s. 117(9)(d)
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA), IRPR
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Timing of disclosure in immigration application process
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose immediate family members
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Inadmissibility based on misrepresentation by omission

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration sponsorship eligibility due to prior misrepresentation

Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant concealed marriage and child until after landing
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misrepresentation through omission during permanent residence process
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Standard of reasonableness in administrative review
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Duty of full and truthful disclosure throughout the application process

Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation, duty of honesty, statutory compliance

Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Sponsorship denied due to prior misrepresentation
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Scope of 'at the time of the application' and validity of s. 117(9)(d)
